extendedInfo.description: CATNIP Mobile is an application for the students enrolled at the Center for Advanced Technologies Program at Lakewood High School and their parents. This app allows the user to see the current bell schedule and how many minutes are left in class. It also displays any assignments that teachers have added to their CATNIP2013 MySite calendars. Just tap on an assignment to view its details. These assignments are filtered by teacher.Features:ã»view the current bell scheduleã»view teachers' assignmentsã»filter assignments by teacher and by past and presentã»email teachers from the applicationã»add events to your calendarIf you find any issues with the app, or if you have any suggestions, please email us.

reviews.title: The app itself is fine
reviews.comment: It\'s that the teachers need to know how to put up and organize their assignments so that it works and makes sense with the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Quite helpful, but I don\'t end up using it too often. Very useful for remembering assignments though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Icon is off-center by like five pixels...
reviews.comment: Also, after I downloaded this app, I was hit by a car. 10/10 would download again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love this app
reviews.comment: :-) Keep up the great work mobile team!
reviews.author: Sheridan Bishop
